title: HMSI posts 45 per cent jump in domestic sales in May
description: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India sold 4,50,589 units in India in May, 45 per cent higher than 3,11,144 units dispatched in May 2023. Exports increased to 41,458 units in May from 18,248 units in the year ago period. Total sales last month rose to 4,92,047 units from 3,29,393 units sold in May 2023.
